title: Apply now to the ESA Graduate Trainee Programme
summary: The 2026 ESA Graduate Trainee positions are now open! If you’re passionate about engineering, science, IT or business, this is your chance to turn your dreams into reality.

title: First launch of Ariane 6 with four boosters
Live coverage: SpaceX to launch 25 Starlink satellites on Falcon 9 rocket from Vandenberg SFB
summary: The Starlink 17-32 mission will be the first Starlink mission in February. Liftoff from pad 4E at Vandenberg Space Force Base is scheduled for 7:38 a.m. PST (10:38 a.m. EST / 1538 UTC).

title: Countdown underway for critical moon rocket fueling test Monday
summary: The countdown began Saturday evening and will continue through the start of a simulated launch window opening at 9 p.m. EST Monday. The test started two days late because of predicted arctic weather along Florida's Space Coast.

title: With attention on orbital data centers, the focus turns to economics
summary:
One of the biggest questions in the tech sector has been if AI is the future, where does all the infrastructure go? summary:

title: SpaceX files plans for million-satellite orbital data center constellation
summary:

title: China launches AlSat-3B for Algeria, further launches delayed ahead of key human spaceflight test
summary:
